item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 19, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Have you ever seen soldering this close? [video] (119 points | 18 comments)
2. Nintendo Files Suit for Infringement of Patent Rights Against Pocketpair, Inc (18 points | 2 comments)
3. Why wordfreq will not be updated (1315 points | 399 comments)

8. AI agents invade observability: snake oil or the future of SRE? (13 points | 19 comments)

22. Gentle Guide to Self-Hosting (250 points | 101 comments)
23. Text makeup – a tool to decode and explore Unicode strings (33 points | 2 comments)

25. Hetzner Connectivity Issues Due to Sanction Busting Activities (34 points | 7 comments)
26. Apple mobile processors are now made in America by TSMC (1470 points | 740 comments)
27. The Dune Shell (169 points | 54 comments)
28. Microplastics in the olfactory bulb of the human brain (123 points | 114 comments)
29. RabbitMQ 4.0 (202 points | 78 comments)
